Recumbent races and events on 2017

20 May 2017

Highway to Sky

Innertkirchen - Sustenpass, Switzerland

Distance 28.1 kilometers, altitudes from 635 m to 2224 m, total ascent 1606 meters. Recumbents welcome!

3 - 4 June 2017

Seconda prova campionato italiano HPV 2017

Autodromo di Monza, Italy

1.5 hour race on a legendary Monza F1 track

9 - 10 - 11 June 2017

Human Powered Vehicles Worldcup

Mannheim, Germany

100km, 1h, sprints of 333.33m and 1000m and an up-hill race

24 - 25 June 2017

Cycle Vision

Sportpark Sloten, Amsterdam, The Netherlands

Last year's program was 1 h, 3 h, 6 h and 200 m velodrome sprint

24 - 25 June 2017

Ratareisi 2017

Alastaro Circuit, Alastaro, Finland

Trackcrazy - 24 h endurance event on a flat 2.72 km Alastaro Circuit. Recumbents welcome!

30 June - 2 July 2017

Lowride 2017

Munkkentie 251, Kaarina, Finland

Recumbent summer meeting in Finland

1 - 2 July 2017

100 Kms du SUD OUEST 2017

Vélodrome de Damazan, France

1000 m standing start, 1 h, "course à l'Australienne", rando 100 km

14 - 15 - 16 July 2017

French 2017 Championnat National route, recumbents

Saint-Sulpice-le-Guérétois, France

5 - 6 August 2017

Open Finnish National Recumbent Championships and meet-up

Nokian Tyres Test Track, Nokia, Finland

200 m flying start, 1 hour, 6 hours, 12 hours

13 - 14 August 2017

Endurance 6 h & 24 h

Circuit Paul Ricard, Castellet, France

6 and 24 hours races on a legendary 3.8 km Paul Ricard track. Recumbents are welcome!

16 - 17 September 2017

French 2017 Championnat National CLM, recumbents

Montbard, Côte d'Or, France

Individual and Team (duo) Time Trials, very flat road, see Openrunner ID 6698287

25 September 2017

36th Duo Normand

Maraigny, France

Duo Normand is a time-trial race by team of two on a road of 54.3 km. Recumbents are welcome!
